SELECT ISNULL(mf.rem,'') AS 'remHead', ---表头备注---对应备注 ISNULL(mf.ps_no,'') AS 'psNo',---销货单号(供应商销货单号) RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(mf.cus_os_no,''))) AS 'cusOsNo',----客户订单号, ISNULL(tf.prd_name,'')AS 'prdName', ----货品名称 RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(tf.prd_no,'')))AS 'prdNo',---供应商物料参考编号 --- ISNULL(sapso.sapph,'')AS 'sapph',-------------//物料编码 =原始数据表SAPSO.SAP 品号 ISNULL(pd.ut,'1') AS 'unit',---------单位 '1' AS 'unit', CONVERT(VARCHAR(40),ISNULL(tf.qty,0)) AS 'qty',---数量 CONVERT(VARCHAR(40),ISNULL(tf.up,0))AS 'up',----单价 CONVERT(VARCHAR(40),ISNULL(tf.amtn_net,0)) AS 'amtnNet',---未税本位币 CONVERT(VARCHAR(40),ISNULL(tf.amt,0)) AS 'amt',---本位币 ISNULL(tf.os_no,'') AS 'os_no' ,----原来说的cusosno和osno一样,现在这个是ebno ISNULL(tf.bat_no,'')AS 'bat_no',-----批号 ISNULL(tf.rem,'') AS 'remBody', ----表身摘要,对应摘要 ISNULL(dx.name,'')AS 'indxName'----种类名称 , isnull(convert(varchar(50),tfz.bc),'')AS 'bc'---------备次 ,isnull(convert(varchar(50),tfz.mz),'') AS 'mz'-------毛重 ,isnull(convert(varchar(50),tfz.pz),'')AS 'pz'----皮重 ---- ,ISNULL(sapso.caiGouNo,'')AS 'caiGouNo'----采购单号 ,ISNULL(tf.itm,'')AS 'itm' -------供应商送货单行号---供应商送货单行号 =该销货单号导出行的TF_PSS.ITM --- ,ISNULL(sapso.saphh,'') AS 'saphh'------------采购订单行号 ---,isnull(sapso.luohao,'')AS 'luoHao'----落号 ---,isnull(sapso.ganghao,'')AS 'gangHao'---缸号 --,isnull(sapso.realWidth,'')AS 'realWidth'---缸号 ---,isnull(sapso.realLength,'')AS 'realLength'---缸号 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(tfz.CFDM,''))) AS 'chengFenDaiMa'---成分代码 FROM MF_PSS mf LEFT JOIN TF_PSS tf ON mf.ps_no=tf.ps_no LEFT JOIN PRDT pd ON tf.prd_no= pd.prd_no LEFT JOIN INDX dx ON pd.idx1=dx.idx_no left JOIN TF_PSS_Z tfz on tfz.ps_no=tf.ps_no and tf.itm=tfz.itm ---- LEFT JOIN sapso sapso ON ( sapso.osNo=tf.cus_os_no AND sapso.prdNo=tf.prd_no) WHERE mf.ps_id='SA' AND tf.ps_id='SA' AND mf.cus_no= CASE WHEN #{cus_no}='' THEN mf.cus_no ELSE #{cus_no} END AND mf.ps_dd BETWEEN CASE WHEN #{chaXunTiaoJian.startTime}='' THEN '1970-01-01'---传空的过来我们就把时间最小化 ELSE #{chaXunTiaoJian.startTime} END ----小的(远的)时间必须在前面 AND CASE WHEN #{chaXunTiaoJian.endTime}='' THEN '8888-12-31'---传空的过来我们就把时间尽量最大化,其实最大的是9999-12-31 ELSE #{chaXunTiaoJian.endTime} END ----大的(近的)时间必须在前面

SELECT
ISNULL(sapso.sapph,'') as sapph-------------//物料编码 =原始数据表SAPSO.SAP 品号
,ISNULL(sapso.qty,0) as qty---数量
,ISNULL(sapso.osno,'') as osno----原来说的cusosno和osno一样,现在这个是ebno ,isnull(sapso.prdno,'') as prdno---货号 ,ISNULL(sapso.saphh,'') as saphh------------采购订单行号 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(sapso.chengfendaima,''))) as ChengFenDaiMa---成分代码---注意,都是小写那个是为了输入的,这个是为了输出到excel的 ,RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(sapso.chengfendaima,''))) as chengfendaima ,ISNULL(sapso.caiGouNo,'') as caigouno----采购单号 ,isnull(sapso.luohao,'') as luohao----落号 ,isnull(sapso.ganghao,'') as ganghao---缸号 ,isnull(sapso.realWidth,'') as realwidth---实际幅宽 ,isnull(sapso.realLength,'') as reallength---实际长度 ,isnull(sapso.ebno,'') as ebno ,isnull(sapso.sapwlm,'')as sapwlm ,isnull(sapso.maitouno,'') as maitouno ,isnull(sapso.rem_Body,'') as remBody FROM MF_PSS mf LEFT JOIN TF_PSS tf ON mf.ps_no=tf.ps_no left JOIN TF_PSS_Z tfz on tfz.ps_no=tf.ps_no and tf.itm=tfz.itm LEFT JOIN sapso sapso ON ( sapso.osNo=tf.cus_os_no AND sapso.prdNo=tf.prd_no and sapso.chengfendaima=tfz.cfdm) WHERE mf.ps_id='SA' AND tf.ps_id='SA' AND mf.cus_no= CASE WHEN #{cus_no}='' THEN mf.cus_no ELSE #{cus_no} END AND mf.ps_dd BETWEEN CASE WHEN #{chaXunTiaoJian.startTime}='' THEN '1970-01-01'---传空的过来我们就把时间最小化 ELSE #{chaXunTiaoJian.startTime} END ----小的(远的)时间必须在前面 AND CASE WHEN #{chaXunTiaoJian.endTime}='' THEN '8888-12-31'---传空的过来我们就把时间尽量最大化,其实最大的是9999-12-31 ELSE #{chaXunTiaoJian.endTime} END ----大的(近的)时间必须在前面
mapper.update: UPDATE TF_POS SET PRE_ITM=ITM WHERE OS_NO=#{mfPosWithBLOBs.osNo}

UPDATE A SET A.REM=B.REM FROM TF_POS A,TF_POS B,TF_SQ C WHERE A.os_id='PO' AND A.qt_no like 'SQ%' AND (A.REM IS NULL or A.rem='') AND B.os_id='SO' AND (B.REM IS NOT NULL AND B.rem != '') AND A.SQ_NO=C.SQ_NO AND A.OTH_ITM=C.ITM AND C.SO_NO=B.OS_NO AND C.EST_ITM=B.ITM

UPDATE A SET A.SUP_PRD_NO=B.SUP_PRD_NO FROM TF_POS A,TF_POS B,TF_SQ C WHERE A.os_id='PO' AND A.qt_no like 'SQ%' AND (A.SUP_PRD_NO IS NULL or A.SUP_PRD_NO='') AND B.os_id='SO' AND (B.SUP_PRD_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.SUP_PRD_NO!='') AND A.SQ_NO=C.SQ_NO AND A.OTH_ITM=C.ITM AND C.SO_NO=B.OS_NO AND C.EST_ITM=B.ITM
UPDATE C SET C.SUP_PRD_NO=B.SUP_PRD_NO FROM TF_POS B,TF_SQ C WHERE B.os_id='SO' AND (B.SUP_PRD_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.SUP_PRD_NO!='') AND C.SO_NO=B.OS_NO AND C.EST_ITM=B.ITM
update tf_pos set wh='1000' where os_id='PO' AND wh='00000000'
update tf_pos set wh='2000' where os_id='PO' and os_no in (select os_no from mf_pos where cus_no='F031') and wh != '2000'

UPDATE D SET D.SDDH=B.OS_NO FROM TF_POS A,TF_POS B,TF_SQ C,TF_POS_Z D WHERE A.os_id='PO' AND A.qt_no like 'SQ%' AND B.os_id='SO' AND A.SQ_NO=C.SQ_NO AND A.OTH_ITM=C.ITM AND C.SO_NO=B.OS_NO AND C.EST_ITM=B.ITM AND D.OS_NO=A.OS_NO AND (D.SDDH IS NULL OR D.SDDH='')
UPDATE A SET A.CK_DD=B.FHRQ FROM MF_CK A,MF_CK_Z B WHERE A.CK_NO=B.CK_NO AND B.FHRQ is NOT NULL AND A.SA_CLS_ID='F'
UPDATE A SET A.CK_DD=B.FHRQ FROM TF_CK A,MF_CK_Z B,MF_CK C WHERE A.CK_NO=B.CK_NO AND B.FHRQ is NOT NULL AND A.CK_NO=C.CK_NO AND C.SA_CLS_ID='F'
UPDATE A SET A.CK_DD=Datename(year,GetDate())+'-'+Datename(month,GetDate())+'-'+Datename(day,GetDate()) FROM MF_CK A,MF_CK_Z B WHERE A.CK_NO=B.CK_NO AND B.FHRQ is NULL AND A.SA_CLS_ID='F'

UPDATE A SET A.CK_DD=Datename(year,GetDate())+'-'+Datename(month,GetDate())+'-'+Datename(day,GetDate()) FROM TF_CK A,MF_CK_Z B,MF_CK C WHERE A.CK_NO=B.CK_NO AND B.FHRQ is NULL AND A.CK_NO=C.CK_NO AND C.SA_CLS_ID='F'
